item.title: Live updates: Republicans applaud Trump address to Congress; Democrats blast it as divisive

item.title: Rep. Sylvester Turner of Texas found dead, law enforcement official says
Markets poised to recover as Trump official suggests tariffs to be eased today
Divided Supreme Court says judge can force Trump administration to pay foreign aid
item.description: The administration asked the Supreme Court to halt a judge’s order to restart nearly $2 billion in USAID payments for work that has already been done.
